ValidationRule.description: Once Surround Pricing fields are populated certain fields are not editable anymore in SFDC
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", $Profile.Name <> "Data Loader Profile", $Profile.Name <> "Integration API Only Profile", NOT($Permission.CQ_Business_admin)), Quote_Type__c = 'CQ', Surround_Priced_Account__c <> null, OR( ISCHANGED( CQ_Value__c ) , ISCHANGED( CurrencyIsoCode ) , ISCHANGED( CQ_Ready_for_Submission__c ) , ISCHANGED( Apttus_Proposal__Proposal_Expiration_Date__c ) , ISCHANGED( CQ_Initial_Pricing_Date__c ), ISCHANGED( CQ_Surround_Master_Quote__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When Quote is priced following fields are not editable anymore: Currency, Ready for Submission, Quote Expiration Date, Initial Pricing Date, CQ Value.
